entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
